General.Name: Stallion Gold Corp
General.Description: Stallion Discoveries Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral property assets in the United States and Canada. The company explores for uranium and gold deposits. It holds 100% interest in the Horse Heaven project that includes 699 mining claims covering an area of 14,374 acres located in Valley County, Idaho. The company also holds an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Richmond Mountain property, which comprises 117 mining claims covering an area of 950 hectares situated on the prolific Battle Mountain-Eureka Trend, Nevada. In addition, it holds 100% interests in eight projects that consists of 23 mineral claims covering an area of 78,831 hectares located in Athabasca Basin, Saskatchewan. Stallion Discoveries Corp. was formerly known as Stallion Gold Corp. and changed its name to Stallion Discoveries Corp. in January 2023. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 700-838 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0A6
